skills.name: KEYS TO HEAVEN
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Remove Perfect Immunity from the target.
• Remove All Offensive Effects from the target.
• Inflict Perfect Corruption on the target for 1 turn.

skills.name: OBEDIENCE
desc: • Remove Negative Effects from all allies.
• Heal all allies based on your MAGIC stat.
• Grant Class Advantage to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: TRIPLE CROWN
desc: Immune to Stun, Blind, and Silence. Absorbs all Physical Damage and returns it at the end of each turn to all enemies. Inflicts Stop and Seal on a random enemy every turn for 2 turns.
